# 排序

## 1. 冒泡（从小到大排序）

```c
void BubberSort(ElemType data[], int length)
{
    int max = length - 1;//最大下标
    //从前往后冒
    for (int i = 0; i < max; i++) //i为1时表示一个已经判断好,因为是连续两个一起判断，所以i保证到length - 2 = max - 1
    {   
        for (int j = 0; j < max - i; j++) //边界选择，j+1最大到max，j < max
        {
            if (data[j] > data[j + 1]) 
            {
                Swap(data, j, j + 1); 
            }   
        }   
    }   
    /*  
    //从后往前冒
    for (int i = 0; i < max; i++)
    {
        for (int j = n - 1; j > i; j--)
        {
            if (data[j - 1] > data[j])
            {
                Swap(data, j, j - 1);
            }
        }
    }
    */
}

```

改进

```c
void BubbleSort2(int A[], int N)
{
    int max = N - 1; //N是数组长度，而不是最大下标
    int flag = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < max; i++)
    {
        flag = 1;
        for (int j = 0; j < max - i; j++)
        {
            if (A[j] > A[j + 1])
            {
                Swap(A, j, j + 1);
                flag = 0;
            }
        }
        if (flag)//没有交换就是1，跳出
            break;
    }
}
```



试想，如果是2，1，3，4，5，6，7，8，9，10就很有用了。

i为1时，会交换一次，i为2时，没有交换直接跳出。

### 时间复杂度

若文件的初始状态是正序的，一趟扫描即可完成排序。所需的关键字比较次数$C$， 和记录移动次数$M$

 均达到最小值：

![img](https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/formula/03e35724822180365d0d937fbc68b9b2.svg)

![img](https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/formula/9a569e56b84494c24acb31885c070f6f.svg)

所以，冒泡排序最好的[时间复杂度](https://baike.baidu.com/item/时间复杂度)为

![img](https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/formula/f5a1886cf2ff13d73aee4d32d363f66e.svg)

若初始文件是反序的，需要进行$n-1$趟排序。比较每趟排序要进行$n-i$次关键字的比较(1≤i≤n-1,一次最多比较n-1次，最少比较1次)，且每次比较都必须移动记录三次来达到交换记录位置。在这种情况下，比较和移动次数均达到最大值
$$
C_{max} = \sum _{i = 1} ^{n-1} n-i = n - (n - 1) + n - (n - 2) + ...+ n - 1 \tag{1-1}
$$

$$
1+2+3+...+n = \frac{n*(n+1)}{2}\tag{1-2}
$$

由1-1与1-2得
$$
C_{max} = \frac{n * (n - 1)}{2}\tag{1-3}
$$

$$
M_{max} = 3* C_{max}=\frac{3n * (n - 1)}{2}\tag{1-4}
$$



冒泡排序的最坏时间复杂度为$O(n^2)$。

### 稳定

## 2. 选择排序

> 从第一个开始，找到最小的，与当前的交换。

```c
void SelectSort(int A[], int N)
{
    int i, j, min;
    for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
    {
        min = i;
        for (j = i + 1; j <= N; j++)
        {
            if (A[min] > A[j])
                min = j;
        }
        if (i != min)
            Swap(A, i, min);
    }
}
```

### 时间复杂度

> i为0时，j从1到N有N次，i为1时，有n-1次，第i次有n-i次

![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2222.738ex%22%20height%3D%227.343ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-3.005ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1867.7%209789.9%203161.4%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Csum_%7Bi%3D0%7D%5E%7Bn-1%7D(n-i)%3D%5Cfrac%7Bn(n%2B1)%7D%7B2%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJSZ2-2211%22%20d%3D%22M60%20948Q63%20950%20665%20950H1267L1325%20815Q1384%20677%201388%20669H1348L1341%20683Q1320%20724%201285%20761Q1235%20809%201174%20838T1033%20881T882%20898T699%20902H574H543H251L259%20891Q722%20258%20724%20252Q725%20250%20724%20246Q721%20243%20460%20-56L196%20-356Q196%20-357%20407%20-357Q459%20-357%20548%20-357T676%20-358Q812%20-358%20896%20-353T1063%20-332T1204%20-283T1307%20-196Q1328%20-170%201348%20-124H1388Q1388%20-125%201381%20-145T1356%20-210T1325%20-294L1267%20-449L666%20-450Q64%20-450%2061%20-448Q55%20-446%2055%20-439Q55%20-437%2057%20-433L590%20177Q590%20178%20557%20222T452%20366T322%20544L56%20909L55%20924Q55%20945%2060%20948Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-69%22%20d%3D%22M184%20600Q184%20624%20203%20642T247%20661Q265%20661%20277%20649T290%20619Q290%20596%20270%20577T226%20557Q211%20557%20198%20567T184%20600ZM21%20287Q21%20295%2030%20318T54%20369T98%20420T158%20442Q197%20442%20223%20419T250%20357Q250%20340%20236%20301T196%20196T154%2083Q149%2061%20149%2051Q149%2026%20166%2026Q175%2026%20185%2029T208%2043T235%2078T260%20137Q263%20149%20265%20151T282%20153Q302%20153%20302%20143Q302%20135%20293%20112T268%2061T223%2011T161%20-11Q129%20-11%20102%2010T74%2074Q74%2091%2079%20106T122%20220Q160%20321%20166%20341T173%20380Q173%20404%20156%20404H154Q124%20404%2099%20371T61%20287Q60%20286%2059%20284T58%20281T5 0transform%3D%22translate(397%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%223823%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(60%2C770)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%22600%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%22990%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2B%22%20x%3D%221812%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%222813%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%223313%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%221661%22%20y%3D%22-687%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%226.032ex%22%20height%3D%223.176ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1006.6%202596.9%201367.4%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EO(n%5E2)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20d%3D%22M740%20435Q740%20320%20676%20213T511%2042T304%20-22Q207%20-22%20138%2035T51%20201Q50%20209%2050%20244Q50%20346%2098%20438T227%20601Q351%20704%20476%20704Q514%20704%20524%20703Q621%20689%20680%20617T740%20435ZM637%20476Q637%20565%20591%20615T476%20665Q396%20665%20322%20605Q242%20542%20200%20428T157%20216Q157%20126%20200%2073T314%2019Q404%2019%20485%2098T608%20313Q637%20408%20637%20476Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20d%3D%22M109%20429Q82%20429%2066%20447T50%20491Q50%20562%20103%20614T235%20666Q326%20666%20387%20610T449%20465Q449%20422%20429%20383T381%20315T301%20241Q265%20210%20201%20149L142%2093L218%2092Q375%2092%20385%2097Q392%2099%20409%20186V189H449V186Q448%20183%20436%2095T421%203V0H50V19V31Q50%2038%2056%2046T86%2081Q115%20113%20136%20137Q145%20147%20170%20174T204%20211T233%20244T261%20278T284%20308T305%20340T320%20369T333%20401T340%20431T343%20464Q343%20527%20309%20573T212%20619Q179%20619%20154%20602T119%20569T109%20550Q109%20549%20114%20549Q132%20549%20151%20535T170%20489Q170%20464%20154%20447T109%20429Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20d%3D%22M60%20749L64%20750Q69%20750%2074%20750H86L114%20726Q208%20641%20251%20514T294%20250Q294%20182%20284%20119T261%2012T224%20-76T186%20-143T145%20-194T113%20-227T90%20-246Q87%20-249%2086%20-250H74Q66%20-250%2063%20-250T58%20-247T55%20-238Q56%20-237%2066%20-225Q221%20-64%20221%20250T66%20725Q56%20737%2055%20738Q55%20746%2060%20749Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%22763%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(1153%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%22849%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222207%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

## 3. 插入（从小到大排序）

```c
void InsertionSort(int A[], int N)
{
    int temp;                      //用一个变量来记录要插入的位置
    for (int i = 1, j; i < N; i++) //i从第一个位置从前向后
    {
        temp = A[i]; //记录住每一个可能会插入进去的位置，这也就是哨兵
        for (j = i; j >= 1 && A[j - 1] > temp; j--)
            //j从后向前比较大小,如果比temp要大，那就向后挪一个位置，在最后一个不大的位置空出一个位置给temp
            A[j] = A[j - 1];
        A[j] = temp;
    }
}
```

这种算法是将要插入的值的位置找出来，一个一个向后推的空出来这个位置的。

### 时间复杂度

这里如果是最坏情况：



![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%226.032ex%22%20height%3D%223.176ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1006.6%202596.9%201367.4%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EO(n%5E2)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20d%3D%22M740%20435Q740%20320%20676%20213T511%2042T304%20-22Q207%20-22%20138%2035T51%20201Q50%20209%2050%20244Q50%20346%2098%20438T227%20601Q351%20704%20476%20704Q514%20704%20524%20703Q621%20689%20680%20617T740%20435ZM637%20476Q637%20565%20591%20615T476%20665Q396%20665%20322%20605Q242%20542%20200%20428T157%20216Q157%20126%20200%2073T314%2019Q404%2019%20485%2098T608%20313Q637%20408%20637%20476Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20d%3D%22M109%20429Q82%20429%2066%20447T50%20491Q50%20562%20103%20614T235%20666Q326%20666%20387%20610T449%20465Q449%20422%20429%20383T381%20315T301%20241Q265%20210%20201%20149L142%2093L218%2092Q375%2092%20385%2097Q392%2099%20409%20186V189H449V186Q448%20183%20436%2095T421%203V0H50V19V31Q50%2038%2056%2046T86%2081Q115%20113%20136%20137Q145%20147%20170%20174T204%20211T233%20244T261%20278T284%20308T305%20340T320%20369T333%20401T340%20431T343%20464Q343%20527%20309%20573T212%20619Q179%20619%20154%20602T119%20569T109%20550Q109%20549%20114%20549Q132%20549%20151%20535T170%20489Q170%20464%20154%20447T109%20429Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20d%3D%22M60%20749L64%20750Q69%20750%2074%20750H86L114%20726Q208%20641%20251%20514T294%20250Q294%20182%20284%20119T261%2012T224%20-76T186%20-143T145%20-194T113%20-227T90%20-246Q87%20-249%2086%20-250H74Q66%20-250%2063%20-250T58%20-247T55%20-238Q56%20-237%2066%20-225Q221%20-64%20221%20250T66%20725Q56%20737%2055%20738Q55%20746%2060%20749Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%22763%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(1153%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%22849%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222207%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

```c
void InsertionSort2(int A[], int N)
{
    int temp;                   //用一个变量来进行交换操作
    for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) //i从1开始到最后
    {
        for (int j = i; j > 0; j--) //j从i开始向前比较
        {
            if (A[j] < A[j - 1]) //如果当前的j比前一个要小，那就把前一个与它交换，直到不小为止
            {
                Swap(A, j, j - 1);
            }
            else
                break;
        }
    }
}
```

这种是用交换来的，从前向后，如果前面的更大就交换。

## 时间复杂度下界



> 对于下标i<j，如果A[i]>A[j],则称（i,j)是一对逆序对（inversion)
>
> 两个相邻的元素交换正好消去1个逆序对。
>
> ![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2220.472ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%208814.2%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3ET(N%2CI)%3DO(N%2BI)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20d%3D%22M40%20437Q21%20437%2021%20445Q21%20450%2037%20501T71%20602L88%20651Q93%20669%20101%20677H569H659Q691%20677%20697%20676T704%20667Q704%20661%20687%20553T668%20444Q668%20437%20649%20437Q640%20437%20637%20437T631%20442L629%20445Q629%20451%20635%20490T641%20551Q641%20586%20628%20604T573%20629Q568%20630%20515%20631Q469%20631%20457%20630T439%20622Q438%20621%20368%20343T298%2060Q298%2048%20386%2046Q418%2046%20427%2045T436%2036Q436%2031%20433%2022Q429%204%20424%201L422%200Q419%200%20415%200Q410%200%20363%201T228%202Q99%202%2064%200H49Q43%206%2043%209T45%2027Q49%2040%2055%2046H83H94Q174%2046%20189%2055Q190%2056%20191%2056Q196%2059%20201%2076T241%20233Q258%20301%20269%20344Q339%20619%20339%20625Q339%20630%20310%20630H279Q212%20630%20191%20624Q146%20614%20121%20583T67%20467Q60%20445%2057%20441T43%20437H40Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20d%3D%22M234%20637Q231%20637%20226%20637Q201%20637%20196%20638T191%20649Q191%20676%20202%20682Q204%20683%20299%20683Q376%20683%20387%20683T401%20677Q612%20181%20616%20168L670%20381Q723%20592%20723%20606Q723%20633%20659%20637Q635%20637%20635%20648Q635%20650%20637%20660Q641%20676%20643%20679T653%20683Q656%20683%20684%20682T767%20680Q817%20680%20843%20681T873%20682Q888%20682%20888%20672Q888%20650%20880%20642Q878%20637%20858%20637Q787%20633%20769%20597L620%207Q618%200%20599%200Q585%200%20582%202Q579%205%20453%20305L326%20604L261%20344Q196%2088%20196%2079Q201%2046%20268%2046H278Q284%2041%20284%2038T282%2019Q278%206%20272%200H259Q228%202%20151%202Q123%202%20100%202T63%202T46%201Q31%201%2031%2010Q31%2014%2034%2026T39%2040Q41%2046%2062%2046Q130%2049%20150%2085Q154%2091%20221%20362L289%20634Q287%20635%20234%20637Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-2C%22%20d%3D%22M78%2035T78%2060T94%20103T137%20121Q165%20121%20187%2096T210%208Q210%20-27%20201%20-60T180%20-117T154%20-158T130%20-185T117%20-194Q113%20-194%20104%20-185T95%20-172Q95%20-168%20106%20-156T131%20-126T157%20-76T173%20-3V9L172%208Q170%207%20167%206T161%203T152%201T140%200Q113%200%2096%2017Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-49%22%20d%3D%22M43%201Q26%201%2026%2010Q26%2012%2029%2024Q34%2043%2039%2045Q42%2046%2054%2046H60Q120%2046%20136%2053Q137%2053%20138%2054Q143%2056%20149%2077T198%20273Q210%20318%20216%20344Q286%20624%20286%20626Q284%20630%20284%20631Q274%20637%20213%20637H193Q184%20643%20189%20662Q193%20677%20195%20680T209%20683H213Q285%20681%20359%20681Q481%20681%20487%20683H497Q504%20676%20504%20672T501%20655T494%20639Q491%20637%20471%20637Q440%20637%20407%20634Q393%20631%20388%20623Q381%20609%20337%20432Q326%20385%20315%20341Q245%2065%20245%2059Q245%2052%20255%2050T307%2046H339Q345%2038%20345%2037T342%2019Q338%206%20332%200H316Q279%202%20179%202Q143%202%20113%202T65%202T43%201Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20d%3D%22M60%20749L64%20750Q69%20750%2074%20750H86L114%20726Q208%20641%20251%20514T294%20250Q294%20182%20284%20119T261%2012T224%20-76T186%20-143T145%20-194T113%20-227T90%20-246Q87%20-249%2086%20-250H74Q66%20-250%2063%20-250T58%20-247T55%20-238Q56%20-237%2066%20-225Q221%20-64%20221%20250T66%20725Q56%20737%2055%20738Q55%20746%2060%20749Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20d%3D%22M56%20347Q56%20360%2070%20367H707Q722%20359%20722%20347Q722%20336%20708%20328L390%20327H72Q56%20332%2056%20347ZM56%20153Q56%20168%2072%20173H708Q722%20163%20722%20153Q722%20140%20707%20133H70Q56%20140%2056%20153Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20d%3D%22M740%20435Q740%20320%20676%20213T511%2042T304%20-22Q207%20-22%20138%2035T51%20201Q50%20209%2050%20244Q50%20346%2098%20438T227%20601Q351%20704%20476%20704Q514%20704%20524%20703Q621%20689%20680%20617T740%20435ZM637%20476Q637%20565%20591%20615T476%20665Q396%20665%20322%20605Q242%20542%20200%20428T157%20216Q157%20126%20200%2073T314%2019Q404%2019%20485%2098T608%20313Q637%20408%20637%20476Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-2B%22%20d%3D%22M56%20237T56%20250T70%20270H369V420L370%20570Q380%20583%20389%20583Q402%20583%20409%20568V270H707Q722%20262%20722%20250T707%20230H409V-68Q401%20-82%20391%20-82H389H387Q375%20-82%20369%20-68V230H70Q56%20237%2056%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%22704%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%221094%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2C%22%20x%3D%221982%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-49%22%20x%3D%222427%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222932%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%223599%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4F%22%20x%3D%224655%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%225419%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%225808%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2B%22%20x%3D%226919%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-49%22%20x%3D%227920%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%228424%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

如果序列基本有序，则插入排序简单高效。

- 定理：任意N个不同元素组成的序列平均具有N(N-1)/4个逆序对。
- 定理：任何仅以交换相邻两元素来排序的算法，其平均时间复杂度为![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%225.936ex%22%20height%3D%223.176ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1006.6%202555.9%201367.4%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%CE%A9(n%5E2)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-3A9%22%20d%3D%22M55%20454Q55%20503%2075%20546T127%20617T197%20665T272%20695T337%20704H352Q396%20704%20404%20703Q527%20687%20596%20615T666%20454Q666%20392%20635%20330T559%20200T499%2083V80H543Q589%2081%20600%2083T617%2093Q622%20102%20629%20135T636%20172L637%20177H677V175L660%2089Q645%203%20644%202V0H552H488Q461%200%20456%203T451%2020Q451%2089%20499%20235T548%20455Q548%20512%20530%20555T483%20622T424%20656T361%20668Q332%20668%20303%20658T243%20626T193%20560T174%20456Q174%20380%20222%20233T270%2020Q270%207%20263%200H77V2Q76%203%2061%2089L44%20175V177H84L85%20172Q85%20171%2088%20155T96%20119T104%2093Q109%2086%20120%2084T178%2080H222V83Q206%20132%20162%20199T87%20329T55%20454Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20d%3D%22M109%20429Q82%20429%2066%20447T50%20491Q50%20562%20103%20614T235%20666Q326%20666%20387%20610T449%20465Q449%20422%20429%20383T381%20315T301%20241Q265%20210%20201%20149L142%2093L218%2092Q375%2092%20385%2097Q392%2099%20409%20186V189H449V186Q448%20183%20436%2095T421%203V0H50V19V31Q50%2038%2056%2046T86%2081Q115%20113%20136%20137Q145%20147%20170%20174T204%20211T233%20244T261%20278T284%20308T305%20340T320%20369T333%20401T340%20431T343%20464Q343%20527%20309%20573T212%20619Q179%20619%20154%20602T119%20569T109%20550Q109%20549%20114%20549Q132%20549%20151%20535T170%20489Q170%20464%20154%20447T109%20429Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20d%3D%22M60%20749L64%20750Q69%20750%2074%20750H86L114%20726Q208%20641%20251%20514T294%20250Q294%20182%20284%20119T261%2012T224%20-76T186%20-143T145%20-194T113%20-227T90%20-246Q87%20-249%2086%20-250H74Q66%20-250%2063%20-250T58%20-247T55%20-238Q56%20-237%2066%20-225Q221%20-64%20221%20250T66%20725Q56%20737%2055%20738Q55%20746%2060%20749Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3A9%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%22722%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(1112%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%22849%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222166%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)。

所以我们想要提高效率，就要每次消去不止一个逆序对，也就是消去相隔较远的。

## 希尔

> 分组，远距离排序让数组变成基本有序，再最后排一次。

```c
/*希尔排序*/
bool ShellSort(ElemType data[], int length)
{
    for (int increment = length / 2; increment > 0; increment /= 2)
    {   
        int temp;
        for (int i = increment; i < length; i++)
        {
            int j;
            temp = data[i]; //保存要插入的值
            for (j = i; j >= increment; j -= increment)
            {
               if (temp < data[j - increment]) 
               {
                   data[j] = data[j - increment];
               }
               else
                   break;
            }
            data[j] = temp;
        }
    }   
    return true;
}

```

## 堆

堆（heap）就是一棵被完全填满的二叉树（complete binary tree)。

堆排序要做两件事情

* 将每一棵子树进行堆排序
* 将堆顶换到最后，再排序



## 归并

> 将数据分成子序列，再将它排序并回
